newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $113 mln for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $113 mln for Thursday.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Thursday, June 5 are expected to total $113 million in 17 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $33 million in two sales, with a $21 million South Carolina Housing Finance Development Authority deal through Goldmann, Sachs & Co. topping the list.
On the competitive side, 14 sales totaling $80 million are on the schedule. A $18 million Cupertino Unified School District, Calif., deal is the largest.
An additional two sales totaling $157 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the issues Thursday depending on market conditions.
